author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 52-year-old man was hacked to death by two men in Virugambakkam on Tuesday evening.

S.N. Venkateswarulu stopped at a clinic on Kumaran Colony Main Road, when the duo, who reached the spot on a motorcycle, pulled out knives and assaulted him, city police sources said.

The victim, a senior officer in a firm that operates cell phone towers, was rushed to a private hospital nearby, but he succumbed to injuries. The body was handed over to family after a post-mortem examination at Government Royapettah Hospital.

City police officials said a crime team was formed to nab the assailants and is investigating the motive behind the murder.

Stir against Jallikattu ban

Volunteers of May 17 Movement organised a protest meeting on Wednesday against the Supreme Court’s stay on Jallikattu.

The volunteers staged the protest at Shastri Bhavan in Nungambakkam.
title: Duo kills man in Virugambakkam
